td.content: s:pt presents w/ c/o 12 days h/o moderate b/l leg pain, moderate fever and moderate pain in extremities unrelated to movement or posture. she is a 59 yo white female deputy. o:Height 153 cm, Weight 91.2 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 88, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed fentanyl PCA - 50 mcg/hour IV PCA, and ordered CBC, Hemoglobin electrophoresis.

s:pt presents with 6 months history of moderate pain in extremities unrelated to movement or posture. patient also reports increased frequency of moderate b/l leg pain, moderate fever. pt is a female deputy aged 60 Ys. describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 3 years in her past Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 153 cm, Weight 90.6 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 82, SystolicBP 107, DiastolicBP 63, Respiration 14, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed fentanyl PCA - 50 mcg/hour IV PCA, and ordered CBC, Hemoglobin electrophoresis.
